nawa rajaye athuru ayawaya warthawa ada (29 da) mudal amathi rawi karunanayaka mahatha wisin parlimenthuwata idiripath kirimata niyamithaya.rajaye sewaka watup rupiyal pandahasakin ihala damima, gas, parippu, sini, hal massan, saman athulu athyawashya aahara drawya dahayaka mila adu kirima saha panawa athi badu adukirima athulu sahana rasak ada athuru ayawayedi janathawa wetha labadena bawa mudal amathyansha prakashakayek pawasiya.
